channel.title: Fucked up screen
channel.description:
I open up my laptop to turn it on about ten minutes ago and see this giant crack in the screen that wasn't there this morning. Nobody's been in my house all day except me, and I haven't messed with my laptop at all.
It's really weird. I was also wondering if the warranty on the laptop would cover physical damage such as this.

item.title: Fucked up screen
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:6, topic:235570”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=310661.msg2478963#msg2478963 date=1223421200]
I open up my laptop to turn it on about ten minutes ago and see this giant crack in the screen that wasn’t there this morning. Nobody’s been in my house all day except me, and I haven’t messed with my laptop at all.

It’s really weird. I was also wondering if the warranty on the laptop would cover physical damage such as this.
[/quote]

My neighbours laptop got shot by a BB-Gun… It has a big crack in the screen, but it still works. Over time, the screen is becoming slightly better…

OT:
I have had to repair his operating system twice now, $50 a time.[/quote]
Lol my first laptop got stepped on and over time it started getting better, then he stepped on it again, so i got pissed and shot it with a bb gun.

Read full topic

It’s really weird. I was also wondering if the warranty on the laptop would cover physical damage such as this.[/quote]

item.title: Fucked up screen
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

You should be fine then with the warranty. I accidentally spilled coke all over my first school laptop a few summers ago, HP sent me a newer model completely free.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucked up screen
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:3, topic:235570”]Usually they do, just make sure they know it’s an accident.
What brand is it?
If it’s HP, their warranties are amazing and you’re good.[/quote]

Yeah, it’s an HP. And along with this crack in the screen, no mouse buttons, and I need to get the laptop cleaned up diskwise.

Read full topic

Did you buy a warranty? Or was it the manufactor warranty?

Start=!analisis;
if Manufactor
!=screwd
end;
